bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love sweet flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I visit gardens.
🐝 I make a buzzing sound.
🍯 I collect nectar.

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am round.
🌱 Gardeners like me!
✨ I have dots on my back.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often green.
🎶 I can make a chirping sound.
🌱 I love to eat plants.

bug.question: I build big homes with lots of tunnels underground. I am a very hard worker. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
👑 I live in a colony with a queen.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then turn into something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves when I am young.
🌈 I have colorful wings.
🦋 I start in a chrysalis.

bug.question: I like to turn over rocks in the garden. If you touch me, I roll up in a ball. What am I?

hints.text: ⚪️ I am grey.
🛡️ I have a hard shell.
⚽️ I look like a small ball when scared.

bug.question: I fly around at night and am attracted to lights. Some people think I am a butterfly, but I am different. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am nocturnal.
💡 I am drawn to bright lights.
🦋 My wings are often duller colors than a butterfly’s.

bug.question: I can walk on water. I am long and skinny with six legs. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live near ponds.
🚶 I can move quickly across the water's surface.
🛶 I have special feet that don't break the surface tension.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs, but I'm not an insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I live in corners of rooms or in gardens.
🕷️ I am an arachnid.
🪰 Flies get stuck in my trap.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I shine in the dark.
🟢 My light is often greenish-yellow.
🔥 Some people call me a lightning bug.

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
🌎 I am the closest star to Earth.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Sun. People live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌳 I have plants and animals.
🏠 People build houses here.

cosmos.question: I shine at night and change my shape. Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me
🌕 I reflect the Sun's light.
🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that make a picture. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us look like animals.
🌌 You can find me in the night sky.
✨ People use me to navigate.

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of gas that makes light. I'm far, far away, but you can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I twinkle!
🔥 I'm like a tiny sun.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me really well.

cosmos.question: I am a planet that is red. I have two moons and I am named after a god of war. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People have sent robots to explore me.
🔴 I am also known as the 'Red Planet'.
🍫 My name sounds like a candy bar.

cosmos.question: I'm the path that Earth takes around the Sun. What am I called?

hints.text: 🔄 It takes a whole year to travel me.
🛣️ It's like a road in space.
⭕ I'm not perfectly round, but close!

cosmos.question: I am a very large group of stars, dust, and gas, held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 We have many stars!
🌌 Earth is located in me.
🥛 One of me sounds like a drink made of cows' product.

cosmos.question: I am a big storm on Jupiter. I've been raging for hundreds of years! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a large and reddish feature on the planet's surface.
🌀 I'm a giant, spinning storm.
🔭 You can see me with a good telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I'm smaller than a planet and not a moon. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 Some of me have hit the Earth!
🪐 I can be found in the Asteroid Belt.
☄️ Some of me become meteors with tails.
